power.title: Chromatic Bolt
power.fluff: You loose a crackling piece of raw chaos against your foes

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.
One creature within 5 squares of the target takes psychic damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 3 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and 6 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage.

power.title: Dire Radiance
power.fluff: You cause a shaft of brilliant, cold and excruciating starlight to lance down from above, brighter and deadlier the closer your foe moves to you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage.
If the target willingly moves nearer to you before the start of your next turn, it takes radiant damage equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 6 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus radiant damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 10 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus radiant damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The first square of movement the target takes towards you before the start of your next turn costs an additional square.

power.title: Eyes of the Vestige
power.fluff: Your enemy's eyes glow with an eldritch light as your vestige takes hold and scours its mind, while your curse spreads

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.
Choose one creature within 3 squares of the target and within your line of sight. You place your curse on that creature.
If the creature is already under your curse, you can choose to deal your curse damage to it instead of the target.

section.name: Effect (Vestige Pact):
section.text: You gain an effect depending on your active vestige:

section.name: King Elidyr:
section.text: One ally who hits the target before the end of your next turn can roll a saving throw against one effect a save can end.

section.name: Zutwa:
section.text: You gain your Prime Shot or Prime Strike bonus against the target until the end of your next turn.
Your daily powers can give you access to another vestige. See the "Eyes of the Vestige Augment" entry for the vestige to see what effect it has on this power.

power.title: Fascinating Patterns
power.fluff: You create a dizzying array of images out of nothing, lulling your enemies into drawing closer

section.name: Level 21:

section.text: You take damage equal to your level.

You have combat advantage for the attack

power.title: Hand of Blight
power.fluff: A crackling black sphere gathers around your outspread hand, ready for you to smite a nearby foe with it or fling it at a distant enemy

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic and psychic damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic and psychic damage.
Until the end of your next turn, the target grants combat advantage to either you or an ally within 5 squares of you.

section.name: Fell Might:
section.text: If you spent your fell might, the attack deals +1d8 additional necrotic and psychic damage and the target grants combat advantage to you and all your allies instead.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: +2d8 additional necrotic and psychic damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: +3d8 additional necrotic and psychic damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target grants you combat advantage for your first attack against it before the end of your next turn.

section.text: 1d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

power.title: Spiteful Presence
power.fluff: The mere sight of you is anathema to your enemy

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage.

If the target is bloodied and you are not bloodied, the necrotic damage increases to 2d10 + Charisma modifier, and the target gains +2 bonus to attack rolls against you until the start of your next turn.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Increases to 3d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Increases to 4d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If you are not bloodied, the target gains combat advantage against you until the start of your next turn.
